#summary How to install Mobile On Desktop from source

= Requirements =
You need the complete [http://qt.nokia.com/downloads Nokia Qt SDK].

== Linux ==
Ensure that the Qt SDK is installed. Open a terminal and type:

$qmake
or 
$qmake-qt4

If a error occured the Qt4 SDK is not installed.

To install it, it depends of your Linux distro.

$ sudo apt-get install qt4-dev 
for Debian or Debian based distro

$ sudo yum install qt-devel

== Windows ==

Download the complete SDK. Open MobileOnDesktop.pro with Qt-Creator and build it.
